MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G81 postcode area of Clydebank. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 4:12am. Our engineers have arrived on site and are working to repair an underground cable fault near Melbourne Avenue substation. The team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by midday. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:20am on Friday, 05 February 2021
